round 14 and 12 stitches on each needle respectively then knit round 1 once more working only the first 2 decreases on the instep needle only and knitting all stitches on the sole needle you should now have 24 stitches remaining 12 per needle graft remaining stitches together using the kitchener stitch special instructions for shorties cuff using either cuff option leg work through 2 or 3
